title: OpenPhone API
author: Rajiv Ayyangar
excerpt: Your calls, texts, and contacts in an intuitive app that works across all your devices, so you never miss a customer. With the new API, automate text messages, sync contacts, log activity in your CRM, and deeply integrate OpenPhone with your tech stack.

Free Options

Your calls, texts, and contacts in an intuitive app that works across all your devices, so you never miss a customer. With the new API, automate text messages, sync contacts, log activity in your CRM, and deeply integrate OpenPhone with your tech stack.
